about_the_game:
Hunting Seas is a Dark Turn Based Boss Hunt which has you leading a fleet of ships harboring the last remnants of humanity; survivals of a now flooded world.

As the Fleet Admiral, you decide how to use scarce available resources and answer the most vital question: To hunt or hide?


  • Manage the fleet resources: build & repair ships, feed the crew and promote captains.
  • Hunt giant sea creatures in tactical turn-based naval battles.
  • Be careful to survive: a single bump from such creatures can sink your fragile ships.
  • Strategize to prevail: use Instant Skills to build up your attack plan and finish it with powerful Casted Skills.
  • Customize your hunting fleet: Assign Captains to your ships and create unique skill sets to increase their odds of staying alive.
  • Collect the spoils of the hunt, meat and bones, the only remaining resources of this new world.
  • Sail across the seven seas: hunt or be hunted by different and unique sea creatures.

short_description: Hunting Seas is a Dark Turn-based Boss Hunt RPG. In a flooded world plagued by deep sea horrors, lead a fleet of ship to survival. Hunt larger than life creatures; use their meat and bones to feed your crew; Sail and discover the secrets of the sea...
